definition: The term refers to the opposite direction of movement or orientation, typically denoting a backward or reverse motion. It is commonly used to describe the act of moving or facing in the opposite direction from the usual or expected way.

examples.german: Er fuhr rückwärts aus der Parklücke.
examples.english: He reversed out of the parking space.

examples.german: Sie ging rückwärts die Treppe hinunter.
Das Auto bewegte sich rückwärts den Hügel hinunter.
examples.english: The car moved backwards down the hill.
The movie was played in reverse.

examples.german: Er sprach rückwärts und keiner konnte ihn verstehen.
examples.english: He spoke backwards and no one could understand him.
